## What is Yajur?

Yajur (yajur.ai) is a healthcare AI and medical data company headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
The name "Yajur" refers to the Yajur Veda, one of the four ancient Vedas, symbolizing structured
knowledge and action — reflecting our mission to bring structure, intelligence, and actionability
to medical data.

Yajur operates at the intersection of:
- Clinical data curation and engineering
- AI-driven healthcare applications (co-pilots, agentic workflows)
- Healthcare data interoperability (ABDM, FHIR, NHCX standards)

## Core Offerings

### Disease-Specific Datasets
- Dataset design aligned to clinical pathways
- High-quality curation, annotation, and validation
- AI-ready dataset engineering for training and fine-tuning
- Data governance, privacy, and compliance profiling

### AI-Driven Healthcare Applications
- Intelligent clinical co-pilots and agent orchestration
- Patient-centric data constructs for clinical, operational, and research use cases
- Multi-modal data pipelines (structured, unstructured, imaging, voice)
- Composable application frameworks for configurable AI capabilities

### Compliance-Driven Interoperability Pipelines
- Standards-based ingestion from clinical and administrative sources (FHIR, HL7)
- ABDM-compliant data pipelines for India's national digital health mission
- NHCX integration for health claims digitization
- Privacy-first architecture with consent management and de-identification
- Scalable cloud-native data lakehouse for longitudinal patient records

## Compliance & Certifications

- HIPAA (USA)
- SOC 2 (Security)
- ABDM (India's Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission)
